doc.title: Spy School: Secret World of Crime, Intrigue, Surveillance, and Gadgetry
doc.plot: Presented by controversial former British intelligence officer David Shayler, the series reveals the secrets of the world's most elite spy organizations from the CIA to the KGB. Spy School explores the world's underbelly of crime, sex, intrigue and gadgetry. It's a manual for conducting surveillance, seduction, bribery and brainwashing. Spy School is a must-watch series that is full of indispensable information, irresistible features, spy challenges and how-to guides. Spy School is a magazine entertainment show that is a gateway into all things undercover and underhanded. It is knowing and ironic, with a set and situations that draw from real-life spy encounters that are stranger than any fiction.
